info.title: Twilio Messaging API
info.description: A Message instance resource represents an inbound or outbound message. When you send an SMS or MMS message via the REST API, use the <Message> verb in TwiML, or someone sends a message to one of your Twilio numbers Twilio creates a Message instance resource.

get.description: This resource represents an individual SMS or MMS message.

parameters.name: This resource represents an individual SMS or MMS message.
